io.neba.core.logviewer

Class LogfileViewerConsolePlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • org.apache.felix.webconsole.AbstractWebConsolePlugin
          • io.neba.core.logviewer.LogfileViewerConsolePlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig, org.eclipse.gemini.blueprint.context.BundleContextAware

    @Service
public class LogfileViewerConsolePlugin
extends org.apache.felix.webconsole.AbstractWebConsolePlugin
implements org.eclipse.gemini.blueprint.context.BundleContextAware
    A web console plugin for tailing and downloading the CQ logfiles placed within the sling log directory as configured in the Apache Sling Logging Configuration.
    Author:
    Olaf Otto
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
